spell_tooltip.description: Tranquility protects you from all harm while it is channeled, and its healing is increased by 20%.
Increases the range of Cyclone, Typhoon, and Entangling Roots by 5 yds.
Reduces the mana cost of your Lifebloom by 8%, and your Lifebloom also applies Focused Growth to the target, increasing Lifebloom's healing by 8%. Stacks up to 3 times.
Heals you for 32% health over 3 sec, and increases healing received by 20%.

Heals the target for 252,751 over 14 sec.

You can apply Rejuvenation twice to the same target.

ree of Life: Healing increased by 40% and Mana cost reduced by 30%.
Call down a burst of energy, causing 259,327 Arcane damage to the target, and 90,214 Arcane damage to all other enemies within 5 yards. Deals reduced damage beyond 8 targets.
Barkskin's duration is increased by 4 sec.
Launch a surge of stellar energies at the target, dealing 297,852 Astral damage.
Increases armor by 19,766 for 7 sec.
Frenzied Regeneration and Barkskin increase all healing received by 20%.

Heals up to 5 injured allies within 30 yards of the target for 141,593 over 7 sec. Healing starts high and declines over the duration.

ree of Life: Affects 2 additional targets.
Magical damage and healing increased by 6%.
Reduces all damage taken by 4%.
Roots the target and all enemies within 12 yards in place for 10 sec. Damage may interrupt the effect. Usable in all shapeshift forms.
Increases the range of all of your spells by 5 yards.
Fly to a nearby ally's position.
Tosses the enemy target into the air, disorienting them but making them invulnerable for up to 6 sec. Only one target can be affected by your Cyclone at a time.
Instantly heals you for 30% of maximum health. Usable in all shapeshift forms.

Wrath, Starsurge, and Starfire damage increased by 5%. 

Starsurge's cooldown is reduced by 4 sec and its mana cost is reduced by 50%.
When you use Barkskin or Survival Instincts, absorb 201,257 damage for 8 sec.
For 4 sec after shifting into Bear Form, your health and armor are increased by 15%.
Stamina in Bear Form is increased by 10%.
Shift into Bear Form and let loose a wild roar, increasing the movement speed of all friendly players within 15 yards by 60% for 8 sec.

Increases your damage and healing by 3% during the day.

Increases your Versatility by 2% during the night.
Shred, Swipe, Rake, Mangle, and Thrash damage increased by 10%.

You gain 12% of a stat while in each form:

No Form: Haste
Cat Form: Critical Strike
Bear Form: Versatility
Moonkin Form: Mastery
Moonfire and Sunfire damage increased by 10%. Rejuvenation and Wild Growth healing increased by 5%.
Survival Instincts and Barkskin reduce damage taken by an additional 10%.
Shift into Bear Form and invoke the spirit of Ursol to let loose a deafening roar, incapacitating all enemies within 10 yards for 3 sec. Damage will cancel the effect.
Cooldown reduced by 60 sec.
When you fall below 40% health, you cast Frenzied Regeneration, up to once every 120 sec.

Abilities not associated with your specialization are substantially empowered for 45 sec.

alance: Cast time of Balance spells reduced by 30% and damage increased by 20%.

eral: Gain 1 Combo Point every 2 sec while in Cat Form and Physical damage increased by 20%.

uardian: Bear Form gives an additional 20% Stamina, multiple uses of Ironfur may overlap, and Frenzied Regeneration has 2 charges.

Heals the target for 177,527 over 15 sec. When Lifebloom expires or is dispelled, the target is instantly healed for 123,762.

May be active on one target at a time.
Heals you for 3% of your maximum health every 5 sec. If you are at full health, an injured party or raid member will be healed instead.
Your next Regrowth, Rebirth, or Entangling Roots is instant, free, castable in all forms, and heals for an additional 100%.
Your healing over time from Lifebloom has a 5% chance to cause a Clearcasting state, making your next Regrowth cost no mana.
Swiftmend heals the target for 113,361 over 9 sec.
Clearcast Regrowths heal for an additional 30%.
Protects a friendly target for 30 sec. Any damage taken will consume the ward and heal the target for 543,766 over 8 sec.
Increases Omen of Clarity's chance to activate Clearcasting to 5% and Clearcasting can stack 1 additional time.
Grows a healing blossom at the target location, restoring 18,304 health to three injured allies within 10 yards every 1.9 sec for 30 sec. Limit 1.

Heals all allies within 45 yards for 1 million over 7.5 sec. Each heal heals the target for another 6,128 over 8 sec, stacking.

Healing decreased beyond 5 targets.

The target's skin becomes as tough as Ironwood, reducing damage taken by 20% and increasing healing from your heal over time effects by 20% for 16 sec.

Allies protected by your Ironbark also receive 75% of the healing from each of your active Rejuvenations.
Swiftmend increases the healing of your next Regrowth or Rejuvenation by 150%, or your next Wild Growth by 50%.

Summons a Treant which will immediately cast Swiftmend on your current target, healing for 113,794.  The Treant will cast Nourish on that target or a nearby ally periodically, healing for 29,759. Lasts 15 sec.
When Rejuvenation heals a target below 60% health, it applies Cultivation to the target, healing them for 15,546 over 6 sec.
Ironbark increases healing from your heal over time effects by 20%.
Regrowth's healing over time is increased by 50%, and it also applies to the target of your Lifebloom.

ourish
Regrowth decreases the cast time of your next Nourish by 33% and causes it to receive an additional 33% bonus from astery: Harmony. Stacks up to 3 times.

rove Guardians
Treants from Grove Guardians also cast Wild Growth immediately when summoned, healing 5 allies within 40 yds for 28,452 over 7 sec.
Lifebloom counts for 3 stacks of Mastery: Harmony.
Allies protected by your Ironbark also receive 75% of the healing from each of your active Rejuvenations and Ironbark's duration is increased by 4 sec.
Apply Lifebloom, Rejuvenation, Wild Growth, and Regrowth's heal over time effect to an ally.

Shapeshift into the Tree of Life, increasing healing done by 10%, increasing armor by 120%, and granting protection from Polymorph effects. Functionality of Rejuvenation, Wild Growth, Regrowth, Entangling Roots, and Wrath is enhanced.

Lasts 30 sec. You may shapeshift in and out of this form for its duration.
Swiftmend no longer consumes a heal over time effect, and extends the duration of your heal over time effects on the target by 8 sec.

ncarnation: Tree of Life
During Incarnation: Tree of Life, you summon a Grove Guardian every 10 sec. The cooldown of Incarnation: Tree of Life is reduced by 5.0 sec when Grove Guardians fade.

 onvoke the Spirits
Convoke the Spirits' cooldown is reduced by 50% and its duration and number of spells cast is reduced by 25%. Convoke the Spirits has an increased chance to use an exceptional spell or ability.
Rejuvenation instantly heals your target for 30% of its total periodic effect and Regrowth's duration is increased by 6 sec.

While your Lifebloom is on yourself, your periodic heals heal 10% faster.

While your Lifebloom is on an ally, your periodic heals on them have a 4% chance to cause it to bloom.
You may Lifebloom two targets at once, but Lifebloom's healing is reduced by 10%.
Every 3 casts of Swiftmend grants you Incarnation: Tree of Life for 10 sec.
You can apply Rejuvenation twice to the same target. Rejuvenation's duration is increased by 2 sec.
Grove Guardians causes your next targeted heal to create 2 Dream Petals near the target, healing up to 3 nearby allies for 92,382. Stacks up to 3 charges.
Your Grove Guardians cast Moonfire on nearby targets about once every 6 sec.
Your maximum mana is increased by 5%.
Your Regrowth protects you, reducing damage you take by 8% while your Regrowth is on you.
Your Grove Guardians increase the healing of your Rejuvenation, Efflorescence, and Lifebloom by 10% while active.
Casting Swiftmend increases your Haste by 10% for 6 sec.

Wrath and Starfire damage increased by 10%. 

Regrowth, Wild Growth, and Swiftmend healing increased by 9%.
Your Grove Guardians' healing is increased by 30%.

Time elapsed while your major abilities are available to be used is subtracted from that ability's cooldown after the next time you use it, up to 15 seconds.

Affects Nature's Swiftness, Incarnation: Tree of Life, and Convoke the Spirits.

Every 5 Regrowths you cast makes your next Wrath, Starfire, or Entangling Roots instant and increases damage it deals by 100%.

Every 5 Starsurges you cast makes your next Regrowth or Entangling roots instant.
Each of your Grove Guardians increases your healing done by 5% while active.
